WRITING.TEXT: I would simply find a moment to ask her what she thinks about me. she will definitely ask you why you asked,then you can break it to her quietly and tell before hand not to freak out.
It all depends on your approach in the asking.

Your girl has your back, her siblings got your back too, screw her parents because you've got the necessary backups already. Let her turn 21 while you try and be self made before she turns 21, then you two can elope together. Be yourself, if she loves you for who you're then to hell to what every other person thinks. I bet her father is a control maniac.
Just ask her out for a date. And be bold about it.
You don't want kids now or you don't want kids ever?
Ever talked to her about this?
